tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE remote_work_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    work_date DATE,
    hours_worked DECIMAL,
    productivity_rating INT,
    employee_satisfaction_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
 employee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 employee_name VARCHAR(50),
 department VARCHAR(50),
 role VARCHAR(50),
 productivity_score INT,
 satisfaction_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE remote_work_trends (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	report_date DATE,
	employee_id INT,
	hours_worked DECIMAL,
	remote_location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE productivity_data (
	data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	date DATE,
	employee_id INT,
	project_id INT,
	hours_spent DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE employee_satisfaction (
	satisfaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	date DATE,
	employee_id INT,
	satisfaction_level INT,
	feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE remote_work_data (
 work_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 employee_id INT,
 work_date DATE,
 work_hours INT,
 work_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE productivity_data (
 productivity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 employee_id INT,
 project_id INT,
 productivity_score FLOAT,
 productivity_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
  report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  report_type VARCHAR(255),
  report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE remote_work_trends (
  trend_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_date DATE,
  trend_name VARCHAR(255),
  trend_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE productivity (
  productivity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  productivity_date DATE,
  productivity_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE employee_satisfaction (
  satisfaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  satisfaction_date DATE,
  satisfaction_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE employee_data (
  employee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(255),
  employee_department VARCHAR(255),
  employee_position VARCHAR(255)
)
